data.actual_result: - every now and then the new message bar will not have a red line
data.expected_result: - the new message line should always have a red line on the side
data.short_description: Red line on new messages sometimes disappear when zoomed out [possibly macOS only]
data.steps_to_repro: - go to user settings, appearance and change your zoom level to 90% - continue using Discord normally, such as chatting, reading unread messages in different channels and servers
